mapper.select: select subj.sname, stime from student inner join applist on student.id = applist.id inner join subj on applist.subj = subj.sno AND applist.id=#{id}
select sum(credits) as rate from applist where id = #{id} group by sem
select credits as major_rate from applist where id = #{id} and major = 1 group by sem
select credits as culture_rate from applist where id = #{id} and major =2 group by sem
select credits as vaccine_rate from applist where id = #{id} and major =3 group by sem
